content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=35-41, y=-83 to -87)
Complex mining setup consisting of:
- 4 Burner mining drills at positions (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-86.0), (41.0,-83.0)
- 4 Wooden chests at positions (34.5,-86.5), (36.5,-86.5), (40.5,-87.5), (39.5,-83.5)
- 2 Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5)
All mining drills are currently out of fuel but positioned over coal resources

### Iron/Copper Ore Processing at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Mining and smelting setup consisting of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining iron and copper ore
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0)
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5) containing iron and copper ore
- 2 Burner inserters at (-26.5,-59.5) and (-25.5,-58.5)
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5) containing iron and copper plates

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-10 to -6, y=-59)
Large mining setup with:
- 3 Burner mining drills at (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests and burner inserters for ore collection
- Transport belt system for ore movement

### Smelting Array at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Large smelting setup consisting of:
- 4 Stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters for input/output handling

### Power Generation at position(x=4.5, y=20.5)
Power setup consisting of:
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric pole network with poles at (7.5,13.5), (11.5,20.5), (7.5,20.5), (10.5,12.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Fuel Management Errors
- Multiple burner mining drills and inserters are out of fuel
- Ensure fuel is distributed to all burner entities before they run out
- Set up automated fuel delivery systems where possible

### Entity Placement and Connection Errors
- Steam engine shows "no input liquid" warning
- Ensure proper pipe connections between power generation components
- Verify fluid flow direction in pipe networks

### Resource Management Errors
- Some chests are reaching capacity (chest at -5.5,-55.5 is full)
- Set up proper item overflow management
- Consider adding more storage or faster processing of materials

### Extraction Errors
- Failed attempts to extract items from chests
- Verify character position relative to target chest before attempting extraction
- Ensure target chest contains the items being extracted
